Multi- sentimentresource Enhanced Attent.from sentence: In this work , we propose a Multi- sentimentresource Enhanced Attention Network ( MEAN ) for sentence - level sentiment classification to integrate many kinds of sentiment linguistic knowledge into deep neural networks via multi -path attention mechanism .

to learn.from sentence: Then , we propose a multisentiment - resource attention module to learn more comprehensive and meaningful sentiment - specific sentence representation by using the three types of sentiment resource words as attention sources attending to the context words respectively .

attend to.from sentence: In this way , we can attend to different sentimentrelevant information from different representation subspaces implied by different types of sentiment sources and capture the over all semantics of the sentiment , negation and intensity words for sentiment prediction .

word representation.from: character - level and word - level semantics

coupled word embedding module.from sentence: Specifically , we first design a coupled word embedding module to model the word representation from character - level and word - level semantics .
